meanings.definition: Not following a regular or predictable pattern.
meanings.sent1: Her nonroutine schedule kept changing every day.
meanings.sent2: The nonroutine weather made it hard to plan outdoor activities.
meanings.sent3: The nonroutine bus driver took us on a surprise tour of the city.
meanings.sent4: His nonroutine way of solving problems always amazed his colleagues.
meanings.sent5: The nonroutine dance moves made the performance unforgettable.

meanings.definition: Not part of a usual or customary procedure.
meanings.sent1: The nonroutine safety check caught a hidden issue.
meanings.sent2: She had to follow a nonroutine process to get special permission.
meanings.sent3: The nonroutine request raised eyebrows but was quickly approved.
meanings.sent4: His nonroutine approach to cooking led to a delicious new dish.
meanings.sent5: The nonroutine experiment yielded unexpected results.
